snippet: Gov. McCrory of North Carolina and Representative Sanford of South Carolina each received more than $100,000 from Tree.com for corporate board work.
abstract: North Carolina Gov Pat McCrory and Rep Mark Sanford of South Carolina criticize Associated Press report that they received more than $100,000 in stock payouts each for corporate board work for mortgage brokerTree.com under plans that were approved after they took office; report could result in official probe of their business affairs.
lead_paragraph: Gov. McCrory of North Carolina and Representative Sanford of South Carolina each received more than $100,000 from Tree.com for corporate board work.

headline.main: Pat McCrory and Mark Sanford Fire Back at Article About Stock Payouts
headline.print_headline: Two Politicians Fire Back at Article About Stock Payouts They Received
